edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.nlp.tokenizer

Interface Tokenizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IllinoisTokenizer

    public interface Tokenizer
    Specifies behavior for Tokenizers integrated into Cognitive Computation Group NLP software
    Author:
    Mark Sammons, Vivek Srikumar, Christos Christodoulopoulos

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Tokenizer.Tokenization 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pair<String[],IntPair[]> tokenizeSentence(String sentence)
      given a sentence, return a set of tokens and their character offsets
      Tokenizer.Tokenization tokenizeTextSpan(String textSpan)
      given a span of text, return a list of Pair< String[], IntPair[] > corresponding to tokenized sentences, where the String[] is the ordered list of sentence tokens and the IntPair[] is the corresponding list of character offsets with respect to the original text.

    • Method Detail

      • tokenizeSentence

        Pair<String[],IntPair[]> tokenizeSentence(String sentence)
        given a sentence, return a set of tokens and their character offsets
        Parameters:
        sentence - The sentence string
        Returns:
        A Pair containing the array of tokens and their character offsets

      • tokenizeTextSpan

        Tokenizer.Tokenization tokenizeTextSpan(String textSpan)
        given a span of text, return a list of Pair< String[], IntPair[] > corresponding to tokenized sentences, where the String[] is the ordered list of sentence tokens and the IntPair[] is the corresponding list of character offsets with respect to the original text.
